NME results.from sentence: The NME results shows that SIR performs comparatively with RAR ) and outperform other existing methods .

SIR method.from sentence: As shown in , the SIR method outperform the state - of - the - art methods according to the CED curve .

robust performance.in: large pose , expression and illumination environment

our method.from sentence: In the more challenging IBUG subset , our method achieves robust performance in large pose , expression and illumination environment .
